On 5 May 2009, at 14:49, amsmota@... wrote:

> On May 5, 2009 2:11pm, Jim Webber <jim@...> wrote:
>
>> Leonard Richardson would describe that as a level 2 service in his
>
>> (excellent) taxonomy. Such services embrace URIs and HTTP but lack
>
>> hypermedia. RESTful services are level three which is level 2 +
>
>> hypermedia.
>
>
> That classification seems interesting, can you provide some  
> references?

http://qconsf.com/sf2008/file?path=/qcon-sanfran-2008/slides//LeonardRichardson.pdf

We (Ian, Savas, and me) have embraced it as a key part of the  
narrative of our book.

Jim
